entry.title: Former Karabakh officials to go on trial soon, Azerbaijani prosecutors indicate

media:group.media:title: Former Karabakh officials to go on trial soon, Azerbaijani prosecutors indicate
media:group.media:description:
๐ Prosecutors in Azerbaijan concluded their preliminary criminal investigations into eight former senior Nagorno-Karabakh officials, paving the way for trials to begin. ๐ Armeniaโs investigative authorities opened a murder probe after one service member died in unclear circumstances. It marks Armeniaโs latest non-combat army death. ๐ Palestineโs prime minister, who also serves as foreign minister, thanked Armeniaโs top diplomat for what he called Armeniaโs โprincipled approachโ to recognizing Palestine. ๐ Interview with Mary Papazian: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YyFm4XE4LkQ ๐ Interview with Vahan Kerobyan: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ya5HHOBFIv0

entry.title: Propelling Armenia Into the ranks of innovation

media:group.media:title: Propelling Armenia Into the ranks of innovation
media:group.media:description:
In this episode, Mary Papazian, co-founder of the Armenian Society of Fellows, sits down to discuss plans to strengthen the development of scientific research in Armenia through educational reforms. She also discusses the knowledge resources of the global Armenian diaspora. She outlines strategies for transforming Armenia into a regional leader in innovation by empowering a new generation of scientists, and fostering Armenia-diaspora collaboration.

ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด 2023-ีซีถ ีขีชีทีฏีกีฏีกีถ ึ ีฃีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ึ ีฝีบีกีฝีกึีฏีธึีด ีซึีกีฏีกีถีกึีถีธีฒ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซึ ีฝีฟีกึีพีฅีฌ ีง ีณีกีถีกีบีกึีฐีกีฟึีกีถีฝีบีธึีฟีกีตีซีถ ีบีกีฟีกีฐีกึีถีฅึีซ ีฐีฅีฟึีกีถึีธีพ ีกีผีกีปีกึีกีฎ ีดีกีถีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีพีถีกีฝีพีกีฎึีถีฅึีซ 252 ีคีฅีบึีซ ีพีฅึีกีขีฅึีตีกีฌ ีทีฟีกีบ ีฐีกีฒีธึีคีธึีดึ ีึีฝีธึีดีถีกีฝีซึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีจีถีฉีกึึีธึีด ีบีกึีฆีพีฅีฌ ีงี ีคึีกีถึีซึ 72-ีซ ีคีฅีบึีธึีด ีฅึีฅีญีกีถีฅึีจ ีพีถีกีฝีพีกีฎึ ีฅีถ ีฝีฟีกึีฅีฌ ีพึีกีฅึีฉีซ ีฅีถีฉีกึีฏีพีฅีฌีธึ ีฐีฅีฟึีกีถึีธีพ: ีีถีกึีกีฎ 180-ีซ ีคีฅีบึีธึีด ีพีถีกีฝีพีกีฎึ ีฝีฟีกึีฅีฌ ีฅีถ ีกีพีฟีธีดีฅึีฅีถีกีตีซ ีดีฅีป, ีธึีฟีฅีฒ ีกีดึีกีฏีกีบีพีกีฎ ีนีฅีถ ีฅีฒีฅีฌ: ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีจ ึีธึีฑีฅีฌ ีง ีบีกึีฆีฅีฌี ีซีถีนีธึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีนีซ ีฆีกึีฃีกีถีธึีด ีดีฅึีฅีถีกีตีซ ีดีกีถีฏีกีฉีธีผีซ ีฏีกีด ีดีกีถีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีบีกีฐีธีฒ ีฝีกึึีฅึีซ (carseat) ีดีทีกีฏีธึีตีฉีจึ

ีีธึีถีซีฝีซ 21-ีซีถ ิณีธึีซีฝีธึีด ีถีทีพีฅึ ยซิตึีกีชีทีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฟีธีถีจยป, ีธึีจ ีฐีผีนีกีฏีพีฅีฌ ีง ีึีกีถีฝีซีกีตีธึีด 1982 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซีถ ึ ีถีทีพีธึีด ีง ีฟีกึีพีก ีกีดีฅีถีกีฅึีฏีกึ ึ ึีจึ ีีซีปีธึีกีผีธึีดีจ ีซึีกีฏีกีถีกึึีฅึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีึีกีถีฝีซีกีตีซ ีคีฅีฝีบีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีึีกีถีฝีซีกีฏีกีถ ีซีถีฝีฟีซีฟีธึีฟีจ`ิณีธึีซีฝีซ ีฐีกีดีกีตีถึีกีบีฅีฟีกึีกีถีซ ีกีปีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีดีข: ิตึีกีชีทีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฟีธีถีจ ีซึีฅีถึ ีผีซีฉีดีฅึีธีพ ีฐีกีดีฅีดีฅึีซีถ ีฐีกีตีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีขีฅีดีซ ีฅึีฏีธึ ีถีธึ ีกีผีกีปีกีฟีกึีถีฅึีจี Dialog Music Project-ีจ ึ ีีธีฒ ิฑึีฉีธึีถีจึ

entry.title: Government takeover of stake in Amulsar gold mine delayed: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS

media:group.media:title: Government takeover of stake in Amulsar gold mine delayed: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS
media:group.media:description:
๐ UATE, an Armenia-based organization representing more than 150 tech companies, warned law enforcementโs raid on the taxi company GG is fueling concern for foreign investors. ๐ The Armenian government set a new deadline for plans to take a 12.5% stake in the long-stalled Amulsar gold mine project, which was initially set to be finalized by the end of March, but has now been pushed back to September 1 due to โtechnical problems.โ ๐ The government is in talks with Masdar, the Emirati state-owned renewable energy company, in an effort to salvage a major solar power plant deal. The projectโs fate was thrown into doubt last month when the state investment fund ANIF was dissolved.
